name: Dwarf Punk
description:
Build a sprawling dwarven empire (well, at least the beginnings of one) in a spacious underground cavern. Assign your dwarves to the jobs they need in order to construct dwellings, farm fungus, and dig deeper!

Major features in v1.09: a vertically explorable cavern space, a team project to go deeper, and dwarves swinging their tools!

Upcoming in v1.10+: Settings Menu, storage points, dwellings that house dwarves, dwarves that actually eat fungus, iron, and a new team construction task, the chasm-spanning BRIDGE!

Major bug v1.09: Attempting to build a 2nd Fungus Farm will render the game unplayable. Highly advise against doing this.

Minor bugs in v1.09: 

- progress bar when building sometimes gets weird.

- camera can move into the fog
